tool.name: Add allele frequencies to VCF
tool.description: Pindel files do not contain the AF field in the SAMPLE columns. This script will add it. This script will also include a descriptor in the header for AF.

param.name: input_vcf
param.label: Input VCF
param.help: Pindel VCF without the AF field.

data.name: output_vcf
data.label: Output VCF
data.help: Pindel VCF containing the AF field in the SAMPLE column.
